title: "Cnvrg.io debuts unified resource utilization dashboard for machine learning developers"
excerpt: "Accessible Labs Ltd., which does business as convrg.io, today is releasing a dashboard that can be used by developers of machine learning models to optimize their use of server resources. The Jerusalem-based startup said its ML Infrastructure Dashboard can initially be used to give development managers a look at utilization of CPUs,"
